modName: Vampiric Arsenal - ARCANE UNARMED and BLADED GAUNTLET BLOCKING
summary:
-Over 100 Variations of GAUNTLETS with BLADES or CLAWS attached. They behave as SHIELDS, enchanted with 18 variations of MAGICAL cloaks which activate while BLOCKING and disappear while not blocking.
-16 unarmed FIST weapons and 16 unarmed ARMBLADE weapons. Each of them have a unique UNARMED attacking MAGIC.
All items can be CRAFTED
descriptionHtml:
===================================================================================================================================
===================================================================================================================================
===================================================================================================================================
===================================================================================================================================
[b][i][u][size=6]Vampiric Arsenal
- ARCANE UNARMED and BLADED GAUNTLET BLOCKING
[/size][/u][/i][/b]
by the Lost You

===================================================================================================================================
===================================================================================================================================

This Mod Aims to make Unarmed Combat EXCITING like no other unarmed mod has attempted.
I hope you enjoy the work I put into this mod.
I hope you also embrace the work of the mods which I incorporated parts of into this mod.
Please visit my CREDITS Section at the very bottom of the page before downloading this mod.

This mod will not conflict with anything.
This mod will be easy to configure yourself, using TES5 Edit,
because I formatted all entries with clear precision.

===================================================================================================================================
[size=4]
[b][u][i]Planned Overhaul...[/i][/u][/b][/size]

I will rename this mod "[i]Elemental Ninja[/i]" after the next huge update.
All of the concepts I am about to discuss, I have fully fleshed out in testing.
I simply need the time to assemble the pieces and polish the product.

[u][b]First thoughts...[/b][/u]

Let me begin with what I've accomplished.
Fluid unarmed combat that integrates into the Vanilla one-handed leveling system, NO FLUFF. NO PERKS. 
The smooth thing about the mod is it all runs through Weapons. It's a simple workaround to giving unarmed experience/damage gain integration. 
I turned a one-handed sword invisible.
I switched it's animations to unarmed.
I learned how to edit its attack reach, so that i could make it longer for variants intended to be used alongside Battle-Claw Gauntlets.
I applied enchanted Touch magical effects to it's attacks.
I applied enchanted Target magical effects to it's attacks.
The Target magics are applied indirectly to attacking, via equipping an armor piece with an enchantment. 
I Balanced the Target magical effects by creating custom Conditions
This means that you can punch somebody, and set them on fire.
If you have a Firebolt Sigil equipped,you can punch, and project a firebolt,
each firebolt will cost some Mana, but you wont have to "cast".
To "cast" you have to punch, or kick. 
When your Mana gets too low, the firebolt's will simply not cast while punching.
Once enough Mana has regained to cast a firebolt, it will cast again.
This means that they are fully balanced and integrated into the game, using destruction magic tree.
This means that you can role-play as a Destruction Ninja using only my mod.
I perfected custom animations specifically for the Destruction Ninja.
I will included an FNIS PCEA 2 Preset for Destruction Ninja Combat.
Consider that, in game, my methods are the most practical, and are designed for fluidity, with hotkeys in mind, and instant response.
Hotkey a Firebolt Sigil. Equip it. Now when you attack a firebolt shoots out. You lose a little Magicka. When your Magicka gets too low, a firebolt wont cast, but you can still continue to attack, and if you attack in a flurry, as soon as you have enough Magicka, another firebolt will shoot out again. 
Unequip it. Now when you attack, no magic shoots out anymore, and you can regenerate your Magicka while attacking again.
My Destruction Ninja animations include built in Step-Dodge, which triggers instantly during kicking animations, for quick lightning speed dodge.
My animations feature custom variations that are infinite in scale. With instant Dodge response during attacks, combo attack variation is UNLIMITED.
My animations feature a highly specified assembly of unarmed animations from countless sources, perfected for fluidity during attacking.
My animations were built to be used with one of those mods which disables the Player and NPC from turning while attacking.
While equipped with a fire fist, your hand will be flaming.
I haven't actually made a Fireball variant of this phenomena yet lol. I instead perfected the Blood Skaal effect. It also consumes some of the players blood on cast.
It makes blood impacts, even on stone. It no longer leaves a fire impact. I can fire off 10 Bloodskaal blades in one second, while also dodging all over the screen, and striking physically 3 times. The bloodskaal projectiles fire off much quicker, and quieter.
I created Invisible Shields for unarmed blocking. 
The invisible shields allow you to sustain magical effects while blocking.
The magical blocking effects are balanced and consume Magicka just like the firebolt effects.
My persona magickal blocking effect is called Ebony Flesh Stance.
It turns my entire skin to stone, silently, with just a small non-lag transformation effect; a poof of green smoke.
When my skin turns to stone, I gain 75% resistance to Magic/Fire/Frost/Ice
I gain a small health shield (50 HP) while blocking. If an enemy breaks my block, They will have to eat through the meat shield.
The meat shield regenerates each time i transform into ebony again. This represents the actual health of the ebony flesh.
Quickly dodging, flipping, like a living tornado, can be disorienting. Using an unarmed shield, you can ground yourself after dodges.
Too much power is not good. Use your dodge to control yourself and create precise combos. My combat might seem OVerpowered.
IT is far from overpowered. I designed my mod solely to gain spiritual insight into the art of self mastery and discipline.
It is easy to lose control of something so quick. You have to focus to gain a measure of how to utilize your speed to your advantage.
Blocking is one important tool, which will enable you to ground yourself; quickly halting your own movements, to avoid whirling off to your death,
in a drunken flurry. Raising your meat shield, it might sustain itself for up to 3 seconds after letting go of your block. Time your blocks periodically and precisely between strikes to dance around, with your arm-blades and kicks, funneling destructive magicks through your swift movements, while sustaining a meat shield to shrug off any potentially fatale blow and retreat. Closing in an an enemy, you can pummel them quickly with a series of claw strikes, face to face, or launch at them swiftly forward, for a large power stab, or a quick leaping kick, tilting to the side to maximize the flow of magicks through your body, allowing you to possibly fire up to 3 destructive magics with one swift movement. With each physical strike, you absorb some of their flesh. 

Prototypes of these magical blocking shields and magical unarmed weapons exist in this mod, currently.




[b][u]Details...[/u][/b]

 Magical Fist Technique's / Magical Armblade Technique's

[b] Magical Fist Technique
[/b]
- Weapon
- Invisible
- Uses a relative misc item world-model (ex. a human heart falls when you drop a vampiric fist technique)
- Uses Your Unarmed Animations
- Uses Unarmed Sounds
- Uses standard unarmed attack range
- Attacks about 25% faster than vanilla unarmed attack speed
- Fully enchantable with any (FF) Touch magical effect
- Comes in 20 Damage Variations
- Each Damage Variation comes with (at least) 5 Pre-Enchanted Versions
                  

 or..
 [b]Magical Armblade Technique  [/b](same thing as fist technique, but designed to emulate B[b][i]attle-Claw[/i][/b] combat)

- Weapon
- Invisible
- Uses a relative misc item worldmodel 
- Uses Your Unarmed Animations
- Uses Sword Sounds
- Uses increased Unarmed Attack Range  (to Simulate 'assassins creed style' bladed-gauntlet "unarmed" combat) 
- Attacks about 5% faster than vanilla unarmed attack speed (YOURE A NINJA!)
- Fully enchantable with any (FF) Touch magical effect 
- Comes in 20 Damage Variations
- Each Damage Variation comes with (at least) 5 Enchanted Versions


[DAMAGE VARIATION] (yes they will be called something like xxMasochist's Vampiric Armblade Technique) 
                                 (that isn't immersion breaking because you should be reminded of your limits, and always seek to test and improve yourself)
                                  (you should start off a game with Mid) ( if the combat is too hard, try an Overpowered weapon)
                                   ( when you become familiar with the game, you should try to graduate to Low, and then Masochistic damage levels)
                                     (utilizing a powerful enchantment, even with masochistic physical damage, you can be very powerful)
                                     

-Damage Range from 1-1111
0 ---- 1 ---- (Masochist)
x0 --- 3 ---- (xMasochist)
xx0 -- 5 ---- (xxMasochist)
xxx0 - 7 ---- (xxxMasochist)
1----- 10 --- (Low)
X1 --- 13 --- (xLow)
XX1 -- 16 --- (xxLow)
2----- 20 --- (Mid)
X2 --- 23 --- (xMid)
XX2 -- 26 --- (xxMid)
3 ---- 30 --- (High)
X3 --- 33 --- (xHigh)
XX3 -- 36 --- (xxHigh)
4 ---- 40 --- (Overpowered)
x4 --- 44 --- (xOverpowered)
xx4 -- 48 --- (xxOverpowered)
5 ---- 70 --- (Godlike)
x5 --- 100 -- (xGodlike)
xx5 -- 150 -- (xxGodlike)
6 ---- 1111 - (Baal)


[b]Magical Blocking Technique[/b]

- Shield
- Invisible
- uses a relative world-model (ebony ore for ebony flesh technique)
- enchanted with a magical cloak effect that activates only while blocking

[b]Armblades[/b]

- Gauntlets
- Sword on the right hand, 3 Dagger-Claws on the left hand
- Companion items to the "Magical Armblade Technique" Weapons
- Comes in several variations, ex. Dragonblade/Ebony/Daedric/Light/Heavy
- Borrowed from Battle-Claws on Nexus

[b]Claws

[/b]- Gauntlets
- 3 Dagger-Claws on both hands
- Companion items to the "Magical Armblade Technique" Weapons
- Also comes in several variations, ex. Dragonblade/Ebony/Daedric/Light/Heavy
- Borrowed from Battle-Claws on NExus

[b]Others Things

[/b]- A highly customized template of various Unarmed Animations
  compiled into one badass set which is intended to work in tangent with combat projectile magic
- Physical Combat Projectile Magic which is tied to a Sigil which must be equipped
- While a Combat Magic Sigil is equipped, a magical "aimed" projectile will fire off from your body whenever you physicaly attack
- Unequiping a combat sigil, even in the heat of combat, will immediately terminate the magical projectile mode
- Each projectile that fires off has a cost, Ex. A Firebolt will cost some magicka. A lightning Orb will cost more magicka.
  Blood Blades will cost some HP and magicka. Poison Vomit will cost some magicka and stamina.
- My unarmed animations template will allow you to fire off multiple magical projectiles within one smooth animation
- My unarmed animations are also infused with Step Dodge, which allow for extremely fast ninja combos
- Due to Step Dodge, and magickal projectiles, Variations in Unarmed Combat has reached an extreme
- Thousands of Unarmed attack combos are possible using my mod alone
- My mod is a full overhaul for unarmed combat in skyrim
- My mod allows infusion of Magick into all aspects of Unarmed Combat
- My mod is lightweight
- The full set-up for magickal ninja animations will require FNIS PCEA 2 (which works for all races, unlike the original PCEA)
- All magickal combats are full developed, with Destruction Magic Scaling, Custom speeds, Balanced, and Intended for a full playthrough
- My Unarmed combat and magickal projectiles will level up with you, and you can use them ALONE to level up for a full play through
- My unarmed weapons must be equipped in order for the magical projectiles to fire off while attacking
- Don;t worry tho, because my unarmed weapons are perfect for unarmed combat and are the best workaround available for enabling one handed      leveling 
 -On the other hand, the magickal projectiles will work for any weapon, not only unarmed combat, but for two handed swords, axes, maces, etc.
- The magickal projectiles which have a price to pay (mana, hP, stamina) per shot, wont be able to be fired when you dont have enough resources.
- This means they are fully balanced, and spam proof
- This also means that you will want to hotkey the Sigil
- Equip it to fire off projectiles automatically while attacking
- Unequip it to stop firing off projectiles, to reserve your mana, while still attacking physically
- If you leave your sigil on, you will always fire off a projectile when attacking until your magicka pool is drained
- This is an extremely fun way to play skyrim

Stay tuned for V3. I recently moved and am going to start going to school. I will have less time, but I'm also feeling more productive. Biulding this mod and skyrim over the 3 months before moving gave me the confidenced to organize my life in a similar manner. I will publish V3 of this mod containing all of the promised features as soon as a I can, but otherwise, IT will not go unfinished forever. It is very important to me. I still haven't had a chance to play skyrim on PC, even after 3 months straight of modding, staying awake for 3 day intervals. After playing Skyrim which I completed a stable load order for just one week ago AND feeling comfortable with my schooling and living on my own, i'll finish this up for you guys. Expect it to be uploaded between December-February. I have finished all of the concepts and polished them, I simply need to assemble the guts into a presentable form, which is a lot of work of course. Tho this mod will be light in size, the amount of work is far from that, I will leave no depth unexplored and unimplemented.
